actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all bills and resolutions have titles which accurately reflect their contents and all subject matters contained therein.

summary.text: Amends rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all bills and resolutions have titles which accurately reflect their contents, including the specific amount of each authorization or appropriation.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all bills and resolutions have titles which accurately reflect their contents and all subject matters contained therein.
